TopicTitle: Is it possible yo move top menu dock or hide some elements?

Articles.Content: Have some mods, so it is anoiying huge list at top bar, can i somehow hide some?
[This](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60863) might help, it's a toolbar mod.

I don't know any way other than mods themselves - some of them can hide, and other few has workaround - become a standalone icon, or like KAC you change a style, and deliberately not have the other toolbar installed, thus effectively eliminate KAC's button.

But in general - I don't know, and I'm interested in a solution as well.

> 
> [This](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60863) might help, it's a toolbar mod.

i have this one, but it works as alternate toolbar, and cannot hide exicting buttons.

> 
> i have this one, but it works as alternate toolbar, and cannot hide exicting buttons.

A lot of mods let you choose to use either the stock toolbar or Blizzy's.
Take a look a this mod: [QuickHide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95168-1-0-X-Malah-s-Quick-mods#QuickHide).
